product.title: Chicken Little | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Chicken Little

One day Chicken Little is sitting under an oak tree when something—Boink!—hits him on the head. He thinks the sky is falling and rushes to warn the residents of Oakey Oaks. Of course, the sky isn't falling and poor Chicken Little is embarrassed. Still, when something strange really falls out of the sky one night and—Boink!—hits the little chicken on the noggin, the bird's whole world is turned upside down.

Tie-in Activity: Pick out an object or word in the book, such as the bell that Chicken Little rings, and have your child help you spell out the word using refrigerator letter magnets.

Mayhem ensues in Oakey Oaks when the aliens visit town. Ask an older child to pretend to be a TV reporter and report "live" from the scene as the fleet of spaceships descends on the town.
